ResearchProjectDef.label: Tables Designs
ResearchProjectDef.description:
After a long debate about the meaning of life and threat assessment of the squirrels, one colonist decided to develop new table types, so they don't need to chat so often, or in most cases, at all.
With this research, your colonists won't need to share coffee cups.
